item.title: Huge hole around drain near kerb, 2nd February
item.description:
Just at corner of Collin end rise junction with Church Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 40, Church Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: X2 holes very deep. At least five to 80mm deep, 2nd February
item.description:
You will not miss the holes. As you leave the recycling area and drive out of that area the holes are on your left almost opposite the first three houses on your right. Luckily for me I was very observant and saw the holes and manage to avoid it. I imagine that many people have been caught out and has caused many issues withe their car etc.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Shurdington Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pelican Crossing light facing the wrong way, 2nd February
item.description:
Church Street in Charlton Kings on the Pelican Crossing that takes you to the Library and Coop.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Parked cars on each corner of Lyefield Rd East and School Rd, 2nd February
item.description:
Due to the London Rd closure and now the top end of Copt Elm Rd closure due to Severn Trent's massive hole excavation; traffic is now being redirected down School Rd and turning in to Lyefield Rd East. Because of parked cars on each corner of this road larger vehicles such as lorries, vans and yesterday a coach, cannot negotiate the corner. As a consequence drivers are leaving their vehicles to knock on doors to find the owners to ask them to move. This is happening every day resulting in long queues of traffic building up. There is an infants school and a Playgroup/Nursery both opening on to Lyefield Rd East and School Rd. Lots of little children and frustrated motorists are likely to result in a terrible accident. Double yellow lines on each corner would ease this problem immediately. My MP Max Wilkinson has said he will lend his voice to this urgent request.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Lyefield Road East, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On Clearwell Gardens drain cover sinking, 2nd February
item.description:
In road near the rear entrance of Sainsbury's on Clearwell Gardens. Travelling up into the estate it is on the right hand side of the road, but as cars often have to negotiate parked cars, there is a lot of traffic both to and fro on that side. It has dropped a lot in the last few weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Clearwell Gardens, Oakley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
